name: Spinach Casserole
author: Christine Estes
instructions: Lightly cook the spinach and drain. Mix the cream cheese and soup together and add to the spinach in a 9 x 13 baking dish. Also add 1?2 can of Durkee onions, reserving the other 1?2 as topping for the last 5 minutes of baking. Bake for 30 minutes at 350Â°.
